mapper.select: SELECT colleges.id AS cid, colleges.`name` AS cname, teacher.`name` AS tname, lecture.*, colleges.* FROM lecture INNER JOIN colleges ON lecture.colleges = colleges.id LEFT JOIN teacher ON lecture.teacher = teacher.id WHERE lecture.colleges = #{colleges}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lecture ( id, theme, time, address, colleges, teacher, course_type, course_fee, details_page ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{theme}, #{time}, #{address}, #{colleges}, #{teacher}, #{course_type}, #{course_fee}, #{details_page} )
